ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Bindings for additional tree-based model engines for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include gradient boosted decision trees with 'LightGBM' (Ke et al, 2017.) and conditional inference trees and conditional random forests with 'partykit' (Hothorn and Zeileis, 2015. and Hothorn et al, 2006. <doi:10.1198/106186006X133933>).

Bindings for additional tree-based model engines for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include gradient boosted decision trees with 'LightGBM' (Ke et al, 2017.) and conditional inference trees and conditional random forests with 'partykit' (Hothorn and Zeileis, 2015. and Hothorn et al, 2006. <doi:10.1198/106186006X133933>).

name: r-bonsai
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bonsai
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bonsai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bonsai/bonsai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2b925142eb554ea047f0e51b43060ecc78e31f28bbef15c57b2568e50e1d9106

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-dials
    - r-dplyr
    - r-glue
    - r-parsnip >=1.0.1
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-dials
    - r-dplyr
    - r-glue
    - r-parsnip >=1.0.1
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bonsai')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bonsai')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://bonsai.tidymodels.org/, https://github.com/tidymodels/bonsai
  license: MIT
  summary: Bindings for additional tree-based model engines for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include gradient boosted decision trees with 'LightGBM' (Ke et al, 2017.) and conditional inference trees and conditional random forests with 'partykit' (Hothorn and Zeileis, 2015. and Hothorn et al, 2006. <doi:10.1198/106186006X133933>).
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
